column3: utACK ad82cb06cecf84c4f9e5647b404b7eb19f1e9bf3.\n\nTo help other reviewers: The mempool previously accepted an argument that appeared to be coming from the "-minrelaytxfee" option, but in reality (as @morcos said above) the CTxMempool had already been statically created with DEFAULT_MIN_RELAY_TX_FEE before the option was parsed: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/validation.cpp#L
